Services

Visa Services

×

Visa Services

Get a visa to live in Thailand. We will help you to find the best visa solution for your needs and budget. Packages offerred for Education Visas, Volunteer Visas, Retirement Visas and Business Visas.

Contracts

×

Contracts

Specializing in creating and reviewing contracts. Make sure your interests are represented and your contracts are compliant with and enforceable by Thai law. Create employment contracts, partnership agreements, and more.

Company Registration

×

Company Registration

Set up a business in Thailand and let us take care of the hassle and paperwork. Our package includes registering a company limited and we will also help you to get your business visa and work permit.

Notary Public

×

Notary Public

Get your documents and paperwork certified by a Thai notary public.

And more, including litigation, family law, and real estate review.

Need a lawyer in Chiang Mai? Get in touch today.
